rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0001
rows.name:
The Hræsvelgr Mercenaries really seem
to have recovered splendidly. I hear
word of them even around these parts.

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Looks like you really have been
treading in Vandham's footsteps.

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0003
rows.name:
You make the other Merc Groups
look bad. Still, it wouldn't hurt for
them to be a bit more proactive...

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Vandham's group started making a
name for themselves back when I
used to lead my own squad.

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0005
rows.name:
That didn't sit well with me, so I tried
everything I could to get in their way.

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Like dumping all my mushroom
leftovers in a Hræsvelgr cave.

rows.label: tlk43500142_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Nobody does pranks like that any
more nowadays, you know.
Real shame if you ask me...
